name: Kitchen Pirates
description:
Play as Terri, a disgruntled pirate employee who's fed up with the growing inequality amongst your fellow shipmates. Now it's your time to shine! Scramble their forces and steal their food before they catch you! Become the pirate of the pirate's kitchen!  

 WASD to move, and Shift or Space to boost!

This is my submission for Ludum Dare 45 jam, first Ludum Dare, and also my first ever itch.io submission! Note: The art assets aren't ours so we'll be opting out of the graphics portion. 

Participants: Andrew Hsu (programmer), Mako Ikeno (music and sfx)
